posts.title: 为什么这么设计
posts.summary: 为什么这么设计（Why’s THE Design）是一系列关于计算机领域中程序设计决策的文章，我们在这个系列的每一篇文章中都会提出一个具体的问题并从不同的角度讨论这种设计的优缺点、对具体实现造成的影响。

posts.title: pgModeler - PostgreSQL Database Modeler
posts.summary: Open source data modeling tool designed for PostgreSQL. No more DDL commands written by hand. Let pgModeler do the job for you!

posts.title: Top 13 Open Source Database Software for Your Next Project
posts.summary: Open source databases offer flexibility, scalability, and cost savings. They provide robust features for managing data, including relational and non-relational options, plus community of developers that contribute to their ongoing development and support. Here are some top open source databases to consider
